profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

profile:
We appreciate all our customers who made us the best award winners of 2018 in Architectural and Structural category including.

We would design your projects the way we did for "Property brothers" and gone on Air!
***

Our goal is to provide High Quality, Economical, Innovative and Sustainable Architectural, and Engineering Solution to meet all of our clients' demands.
Please contact us to book a FREE  question and answer session over the phone on topics such as Building Permit Process, Architectural and Structural drawings.

***

Design-Build projects through our sister and independent company Rigid Frame Builders Inc. We are ready to help you build your dream house whether by interior alterations (open concept; load bearing wall removal), rear addition, second floor addition, basement underpinning for livable basement and second suite and even to build a brand new house or cottage.

***

You can contact us by (416) 276-6298, (905) 903-5197, (416) 901-5446

***

We service the entire GTA, Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Milton, Durham Region, Halton Hills, Brampton, Burlington, Markham,Vaughan, York region, King, Stouffville, Aurora, Newmarket, RichmondHill, Pickering, Ajax, Oshawa, Uxbridge
service_area: Toronto, Scarborough, Ajax, Pickering, Whitby, Oshawa, Clarington, Markham, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Vaughan, Mississauga, Oakville, Brampton, Halton Hills, Whitchurch-Stouffville, Newmarket, GTA
products:
**Structural design and drawings for small to large projects for Architects, Contractors, Homeowners.
**Architectural and Structural design for residential, commercial and industrial projects including City permit applications.
**Design-Build projects through our sister Company Rigid Frame Builders Inc.
**Design of any type of wood, Concrete, steel and light-gauge steel stud framing.
**Design of Building and houses in Conventional or Modern Style
**Design of Pedestrian Bridges.
**Design of access roads to properties and lots.
**3D Model design of Architectural and Structural Projects.
**Preparation of Steel shop drawings.
**Preparation of Steel stud shop drawings.
services: We prepare a full city building permit package for custom homes, renovations, additions, and basements in accordance with Building Code and City by-laws. We offer architectural and structural design and also construction services for new and old buildings and houses in creating open-concept space (load bearing wall removal), rebuilt new houses, house renovations, house additions, mechanical supports, mezzanines with guard rails and stairs, specialty doors and windows supports, retrofit, and steel shop drawing review and many more. we Are into Design-built projects meaning we are One-Stop-Shop.
specialities:
Permit Applications, Architectural and Structural Drawings for building additions, renovations, rebuild, underpinning, walkout entrance for basements. Preparation of steel shop-drawings
Specialized in Designing of:
> Wood structures
> Steel structures
> Concrete Structures
> Load bearing Light Gauge Steel stud structures
diplomas: Master Degree in Structural Engineering (Ryerson Univ.) and Architectural Diploma  (George Brown)

profile: 'Providing top-notch services at competitive prices for over 12 years across the GTA. Summit contractors have been awarded best of HomeStars contractors for three years in a row since 2018. We specialize in quality home improvement, renovation and remodeling including bathroom renovation, full basement renovation, kitchen renovation and heating and cooling. Our professional team consisting of operating and project management, in-house trades, licensed plumbers, electricians, HVAC technicians and renovation specialists enable us to fulfill our clients’ needs within the budget and timelines with precision, clarity, a unique understanding of the design-build process.'

profile:
We have been providing our construction services for almost 15 years helping our clients to renovate and enhance their living space. Novacon Construction Inc are a full DESIGN-BUILD firm focusing on large scale higher end Major renovations, Home additions and full Custom Homes. We are a very well planned company that work well with clients that are looking for a high end/professional building experience and not a jack of all trades approach. Our clients work with a professional DESIGN-BUILD team that consists of in house designer, Project manager, Site supervisor and tradesman for the duration of their build.
 
Our aim is to produce a high quality product, to perform in the most efficient way possible, and to make your renovation a positive and rewarding experience. All our trades people are highly skilled and bring with them a wealth of experience. NOVACON Custom Builders & Renovators are equipped to work on any area of your home, from major additions, basements, to bathrooms, including kitchen development and we can even build your dream home!
 
A satisfied customer is our best advertisement!!!.

Novacon is a toronto area renovator/general contractor providing professional construction services and project management for new home construction, custom homes, home renovations, additions, home improvements, kitchens, basements, bathrooms and light commercial.

Proudly servicing Toronto, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markham, Ajax and Pickering!

profile:
Willowtree Construction Company's founder Frank Samifanni started undertaking renovation projects as a sole proprietor in 1997. Frank's philosophy in delivering quality work and that has earned him positive and solid reviews and a strong referral base. In 2007 Frank incorporated his company under Willowtree Construction Company and went full force as a General Contractor. 

Presently Willowtree Construction Company undertakes mid size to large size projects from design/ build custom built homes, additions and extensions to the existing structure, complete home renovation including kitchen, bathroom and basement renovations to structural changes . 
As a general Contracting company our trained and licensed trades carry on the work assigned with full professionalism and promptness. We love to deliver turn key projects.

profile:
We are a professional engineering team (Architectural, Structural, Mechanical), ready to provide or help you with your building permit package.

Our Expert Services:
For residential:
• Basement Apartment including walk-out entrance.
• Interior Alteration (structural walls change to beams, add a door or window)
• Attached / Detached Garage, Decking, Sunroom and Swimming Pool etc.
• Brand new house or addition. 
• Laneway Suite Permits

For commercial:
Office, Restaurant, Barber Shop, Tea House, Badminton pool, Dentist etc.

Why us:
• Best service of GTA including before and after permit approval!
• Free Consultation!
• All approved and designed by PEO registered Professional Engineers Ontario and British Columbia.
• Any comments received from the city will be addressed with no additional charges.

How we operate:
• Send us a message with your job description and property municipality.
• Receive Quote and book site visit date.
• We arrive to take measurements and site discussion.
• Our design team work on design to ensure the client’s goals are achieved.
• We provide the permit package or apply it on your behalf.

How to contact us:
• Call or Text: (647)-889-9007
• Email: weconsultingcan@gmail.com

profile:
Founded in 2009, TC Homes is a Luxury Custom Home Builder specializing in development amongst the most prominent areas within the Greater Toronto Area and the GTA.

TC Homes is proud to work with the highly experienced architects and designers of this industry.

TC Homes has two main purposes: to bring quality and safety to life and to exceed customers’ expectations by building every element to perfection.

TC Homes Contracting has provided diverse services for clients and architects throughout the GTA region for more than 20 years. As a full service contractor, we have the skills and experience to manage, build and support a wide variety of project types and client needs; we strive to provide excellent services …
service_area: We serve all of GTA including, Toronto, Markham, NorthYork, Richmondhill, Mississauga, Scarborough, Vaughn, Brampton, Woodbidge, Whitby...
services:
At any scale, TC Homes presents each client with superior service and attention throughout the project. 

Services include:

new construction 
renovation/tenant improvements 
project management 
construction management 
bobcat excavation
estimating and scheduling 
in-house services 
renovations 
From beginning to end, effective construction management is essential to any project. The Project Manager coordinates all aspects of the project and is the primary contact for all needs and concerns for the duration of the project. TC Homes has a commitment to the project and team and employs pre-construction value engineering, savings through negotiated projects, and project-specific construction strategy, while presenting and maintaining the construction schedule with expert project coordination.
The In-House Service Division provides TC Homes clients with continued service after construction is complete. This includes:

facilities management 
monthly or yearly inspections 
cost analysis for budgets 
hourly rates for in-house work 
third party negotiations for other services 
24-hour emergency service 
commercial painting 
exotic coatings 
occupied painting

profile:
Primo Contracting is a full-service luxury custom home builder and general contractor with over 20 years of experience, proudly serving Toronto, the GTA and most of South and Central Ontario in both the residential and commercial sectors.

Our company was founded and has had the privilege of serving hundreds of discerning clients based on the quality of our service, the craftsmanship that goes into every project and our unwavering responsiveness to the individual needs of each and every one of them.

Our clients demand transparency and honesty throughout the process so our proposals are clear, precise and competitive. It also means that we take on the full responsibility of the project, including the inherent stress and challenges that need to be managed along the way, because life is not perfect, it’s a challenge that we welcome and take on whenever, wherever it presents itself. We are fully insured and provide full warranties for all of our work, so that you are confident in our ability to deliver on time, on budget and with a result that you will enjoy for many years to come. All of our talented resources make safety and order a priority in everything they do, to promote a smooth process throughout.

profile:
As an innovative, creative new home builder, JII FINE HOMES has redefined the experience of luxury home living for families who dream only the best. The company’s President, Jim has been actively involved for 20 years in all facets of marketing residential, multi-residential and commercial properties. Noting a lack of high-quality homes being built for discerning clients who wanted something above the ordinary, Jim has raised the bar when it comes to the creation of custom-designed luxury residences exuding architectural excellence and inspiring, spacious interiors.

JII Home Improvement is committed to creating your dream home. From something cozy, economic, and yet good looking with luxurious qualities to two story houses and large mansions, we will build it for you. Our teams of reputable builders and craftsmen turn your dream home to a reality. A place to build and have good memories for generations! We know what you need to obtain a building permit for your property. Our knowledge and know how will ensure your peace of mind.

For clients who already own a property but have not begun the design process, JII can help you design your dream home. Distinctive architectural plans, each with leading edge technologies and exquisite features are synonymous with JII FINE HOMES. 

Trust JII to build your next home or major renovation. JII renovations and additions can include architectural and interior design, obtaining all municipal approvals and scheduling contractors and trades to ensure a seamless transformation from old to new.

profile:
QUALITY IS A WAY OF LIFE:

Inputting over 20 years of experience into the field of construction, Artycon has become recognized as one of the leading Custom Construction Firm. Innovative techniques, customized planning, and impeccable service have allowed us to skyrocket to success and maintain a strong and loyal clientele.We have the passion for creating and building your dream project. We care about maximum efficiency and love to see satisfied client. 

Our Strategy: 

Providing authentic and mindful construction plan along with 100% customized design for each client has been and always will be the number one priority for Artycon Custom Construction . A commitment to extensive documentation and archiving of past projects, along with progressive sourcing and implementation allows us to be exceptional in providing client with top of the experience.

Why Choose US: 

We Love What We Do-
We have the passion for creating and building your dream project. We care about maximum efficiency and love to see satisfied client.

We Truly Care-
The right care can ensure the success of any projects. We believe in partnership & trust and work with you to create a great space. 

Our Promise to You-
We have an unwavering philosophy of caring for our project and our customer's perspectives in order to accomplish the best quality project to grantee your satisfaction. 

Trust-
Our relationship with our clients, professional partners, and subcontractors has transparency. With complete honesty from the start, there is a neutral base to work from. Our foundation is to build a trusting relationship, leading to many successful endeavors together.  

Our Team-

Over the years, we have built solid relationships within the construction industry and our team are highly competent to provide professional services to our customer and clients in the industry from architects, interior designers to specialized trades like Concrete worker, Carpenter, Dry-Waller, Taper/Plasterer, Electricians, Plumbers, HVAC, Painter, Landscapers etc. We are confident these working relationships have helped us to provide our customers with the best quality services for your projects.

We are fully insured and we make sure to use the right procedures to protect you and your property. 

Additionally, we strive to maintain a clean job site and will take necessary steps to keep disruptions to you and your home to a minimum. 

Call us today, and see what our commitment to quality is all about! We may not be related, but you’ll feel like we’re family.

info@artycons.com
